mapper.select: select user.id as id, user.user_name as userName, user.password as password, user.name as name, user.age as age, user.birthday as birthday, user.created as created, user.updated as updated, from SELECT tb_user user where tb_user.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user( user_name, password, name, age, sex, birthday, created, updated ) values ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, now(), now() )
mapper.update:
update tb_user
user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, name=#{name}, age=#{age}, sex=#{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, updated = now()
where (id=#{id})
